p: Eugenol and S. aromaticum essential oil demonstrated great capacity for the elimination of ABTS radical, agreeing with the data reported on the antioxidant activity of clove essential oils with a chemotype rich in eugenol [ 44]. The same result was observed in a study of the antioxidant activity of the essential oil from various parts of the plant S. aromaticum, which demonstrated its ability to reduce the ABTS radical [ 45].
